item.title: On Aid Professionals – Random Thoughts on the Meme
item.description: There has been an interesting debate lately in the development sphere about professionalism v. amateurism and the pros and cons of each. For a breakdown see the always reliable Good Intents. There has been some great writing and thinking on this topic. I would encourage reading through Saundra’s list (above citation) as there are some very worthwhile entries. I have two small things to say, but have little to no argument with the trend the meme is going (which has been summarized very well by Saundra – again – and I’ve cited below).
